Note:
LOCATION (32-bit)
Team Painto Presents = 0x20192018
main menu = 0x65106510

FLIP (8-bit)
X-axis
0x00 = looking for right
0x01 = looking for left

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"Sonic has" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"Sonic has" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"passed" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

BOSS HP (8-bit)
Megacrab (max 0x08)
Gigatron (max 0x08)
Mega Cater (max 0x08)
2nd Dr. Robotnik (0x08) Marble Zone
Mega Yadrin (max 0x04)
Dr. Robotnik (max 0x08)
Dr. Robotnik (max 0x10)

BOSS HP (8-bit)
1st Metal Sonic (max 0x08) -> uncertain (or 0x00d8a0)
M. Basaran (max 0x04)
Megajaws (max 0x08)

BOSS HP (8-bit)
3rd Dr. Robotnik - boilling labyrinth zone (max 0x08)

CONTINUE? (8-bit)
Nothing pressed, Game over
0x61 -> 0x00
0x61 = 97 decimal

D-PAD / BUTTONS (8-bit)
0x01 = up
0x02 = down
0x04 = left
0x08 = right
0x80 = start
0x40 = A
0x10 = B
0x20 = C

D-PAD / BUTTONS (8-bit)
0x01 = up
0x02 = down
0x04 = left
0x08 = right
0x80 = start
0x40 = A
0x10 = B
0x20 = C

X-axis (16-bit)
Camera

DEMI-BOSSES / BOSSES
0x2a40 = Megacrab
0x27e4 >= Gigatron
0x2800 = 1st Metal Sonic
0x0800 = 1st Dr. Robotnik
0x2000 >= M. Basaran
0x1f03  >=  M. Cater
0x2100 = 2nd Metal Sonic
0x00e0 = 2nd Robotnik
0x2680 = Mega Yadrin
0x1840 >= Megajaws
0x20e0 = 3rd Metal Sonic
0x1840 = 3rd Dr. Robotnik
0x30e0 = 4th Dr. Robotnik
0x2560 = 5th Dr. Robotnik
0x01 = Reset the game on the last checkpoint or in the beginning

ACTS (8-bit)
Act 1 = 0x00
Act 2 = 0x01
Act 3 = 0x02
Boss = 0x03

LANDS (16-bit)
0x0000 = Green Hill Zone Act 1
0x0001 = Burning Hill Zone Act 2
0x0002 = Burning Hill Zone Act 3
0x0003 = Burning Hill Zone Boss
0x0200 = Roasting Marble Act 1
0x0201 = Roasting Marble Act 2
0x0202 = Roasting Marble Act 3
0x0203 = Roasting Marble Boss
0x0400 = Flame Yard Act 1
0x0401 = Flame Yard Act 2
0x0100 = Boiling Labyrinth Act 1
0x0101 = Boiling Labyrinth Act 2
0x0102 = Boiling Labyrinth Act 3
0x0103 = Boiling Labyrinth Boss
0x0300 = Fire Light Act 1
0x0301 = Fire Light Act 2
0x0500 = Molten Brain Act 1
0x0501 = Molten Brain Act 2
0x0700 = Special Stage 1
0x0701 = Special Stage 2
0x0702 = Special Stage 3
0x0703 = Special Stage 4
0x0800 = Special Stage 5
0x0801 = Special Stage 6

ZONES (8-bit)
0x00 = Burning Hill Zone
0x02 = Roasting Marble Zone
0x04 = Flame Yard Zone
0x01 = Boiling Labyrinth Zone
0x03 = Fire Light Zone
0x05 = Molten Brain Zone
0x07 = Special Stage

SCORE (32-bit)
The last Zero is visual only
100 on score = 10 on the memory (10 = 0x0a)
